data.client_settings: Chrome Version 70.0.3538.77 (Official Build) (64-bit) / [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 27353
data.expected_result: There is not supposed to be a scroll bar
data.short_description: There is a scroll bar on Discord login page
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Discord's site and press Login - You will be on the Login page and you'll notice the scroll bar - There's no point in having the scroll bar if there's nothing down there. - The screen resolution is 1366x768
